jsportsreg.helper
Class RegistrationDBHelper

java.lang.Object
  jsportsreg.helper.RegistrationDBHelper

public class RegistrationDBHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class is designed to handle all updates to the all member objects that are associated with a Player Registration. This class only takes the registration ID and will pull all corresponding data. This class should only be used as a bean when pre-populating a registration form, otherwise the Registration Controller should send a new Player_Registration object.

Author:
tseiler

Method Detail

addPerson

private void addPerson(Person person)
Adds a person to the database and populates the Person object with the updated primary key field.

Parameters:
person - Person object.

getPerson

private Person getPerson()
Retrieves the person from the database that is associated with the Player Registration. Uses the registrationID to look up the Person.

Returns:

getAddresses

private java.util.ArrayList<Address> getAddresses()
Retrieves all addresses corresponding to the person associated with the player registration. Utilizes the registration ID field. Used to populated the Person and Player_Registration objects.

Returns:

updateAddresses

private void updateAddresses(java.util.ArrayList<Address> addresses)
Updates all of the addresses corresponding to a specific person (based on the registration ID), by deleting all of the records and adding the new list back in.

Parameters:
addresses - List of addresses to update.

getEmergency_Contacts

private java.util.ArrayList<Person> getEmergency_Contacts()
Retrieves a list of people that are associated with a person as emergency contacts. Because these are emergency contacts for a specific person, not all fields are populated. It utilizes the registrationID to find the parent relationship (Person).

Returns:

updateEmergencyContacts

private void updateEmergencyContacts(java.util.ArrayList<Person> emergencyContacts)
Updates all of the emergency contacts associated with a person (based on the registration ID), by deleting all of the records and then adding them back into the database.

Parameters:
emergencyContacts - List of People (Person) to be updated.

addPlayer_Registration

private void addPlayer_Registration(Player_Registration player_registration)
Adds a player registration to the database and populates the populated primary key.

Parameters:
player_registration -

getRegistrationID

public int getRegistrationID()
Returns the registration ID to be displayed to the registrant on the Thank You page.

Returns:

setRegistrationID

public void setRegistrationID(int registrationID)
Sets the registration ID variable to populate a Player Registration object

Parameters:
registrationID -

getPlayer_Registration

public Player_Registration getPlayer_Registration()
Returns the player registration object associated with the registrationID.

Returns:

setPlayer_Registration

public void setPlayer_Registration(Player_Registration player_registration)
Sets the player_registration variable and writes the object to the database. It also writes the value of the primary key (through addPlayer_Registration) to the registration ID value to be display to the registrant on the Thank You page.

Parameters:
player_registration - Player_Registration object fully populated.
